question: "Which American legal TV drama-comedy (2004 to 2008), a spin-off of ""The Practice"", followed the exploits of attorneys at Crane, Poole & Schmidt?"
api_result: The American legal TV drama-comedy you are referring to is "Boston Legal." It aired from 2004 to 2008 and is a spin-off of "The Practice," focusing on the attorneys at the fictional law firm Crane, Poole & Schmidt.
